website_summaries.verdict: This suede-like cover is recognized for its attractive design, supreme protection, and unique anchoring system.
pros: Customers rave over the protector's thick micro-suede
Gripping back keeps the cover in place
Securing straps reinforce the cover from moving
Multiple sizes and color options available
cons: Tends to shift on leather couches
May not hold up well under multiple washings

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: We are a multiple pet household, and recently got a new sectional couch. With young dogs we wanted something to protect and still look presentable, the gorilla grip helps the covers stay better (not perfect... they shift, but love the grips) and the couch sized ones fit great on our sectional (We bought 2). The right and left arm covers cover the middle seat great. The puppy already had a small accident and it beaded up for easy cleanup!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish I’d sent it back...
customer_reviews.text: This was a complete waste of money. The tab holding one side of the back strap detached after one month, making the back strap unusable. And while our puppy did some damage to the rubber backing on the right arm flap, the rubber backing crumbled all along the main seat portion (where there was no puppy damage) - it took me 10 minutes and a really good vacuum to get all of the crumbled rubber backing out of the base of our sofa. Very disappointed - would give it zero stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Probably Better Than The One You Have
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this couch cover, but if you have pets and that is why you are getting this, maybe keep looking. We have 3 dogs who we let up on the our new leather couch, which is why we bought this cover. It is MUCH better than some of the couch covers we have had, but it still moves around and you are always tucking it in. It has a no-slip backing which is nice, but that also means you have to line-dry it (read: NO dryer heat), and when I take it off the couch to wash it, it leaves behind several of the little rubber nubbies - every single time.
customer_reviews.author: KimmieJ

customer_reviews.title: Great cover
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the gray Gorilla Grip cover to protect my sofa from my dog's dirty paws. I had all the cushions dry cleaned and didn't want to do that again. The cover is great. It covers the entire sofa. I didn't use the straps that came with it and it stays on perfectly. I haven't laundered it yet so I can't comment on how it looks after being washed. However, this cover will really save my sofa. I definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rana L. Gerson

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for months now, and it is FANTASTIC. I will be ordering another one once I wear this out. But it’s so durable/washable I’m not sure when that will be! But let be honest with you all, I’m a mess on this thing. I spill a lot of coffee. I have a ginormous dog that like to sleep on it, we work it hard. I rarely write reviews (and only like to once I’ve actually had something a while to truly test it), but this item deserves a review from me. I couldn’t possibly be happier with it. Oh, and I love the color, exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.author: J Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Will protect your couch
customer_reviews.text: It's a good feeling material and will stay in place. The thick strap is a plus. My puppy has already peed on it and it did not stain! My only gripe is that it's not recommended for the dryer. The rubber backing will leave little shavings if you do. I would prefer to wash this every week but it takes hours to air dry. Sadly this may become the backup couch protector and I will go back to using blankets because they can be washed and dried in an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: May be better suited on a material couch/not a recliner, but does it’s job on our leather recliner!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this cover to protect our new leather recliner from our two cats. It definitely does its job but may work better on a non leather couch or one without a recliner. We have some issues with it slipping off when couch is reclined or when you move around on it too much. We are NOT using the included straps though (were worried about it rubbing on the leather on back of couch and causing wear and tear) so this is expected. Very happy with this purchase and it has been very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Lex

customer_reviews.title: Nightmare to wash
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job of staying in place and protecting my sofa, however, washing is a nightmare. A LOT of tiny bits of rubber come off in the washer and the dryer, leaving a mess to clean up. After one wash, it will leave those little pills all over my sofa, so it needs to be vacuumed every time I take it off. Wish the rubber backing held up better. After having this for over a year I'm finally breaking down and buying one without the rubber so cleaning will be hassle free.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Goodell

customer_reviews.title: They do not stay put!
customer_reviews.text: The look great and I love the feel of the fabric. The secure strap for the seats do not connect if you have a reclining sofa. They DO NOT stay put! I'm so frustrated with how easily they slid done and will not stay. They are anything but Gorilla Grip! That is why I gave a 2 star review. If it wasn't such a hassle to return then I would. I do have microfiber sofas so they should have worked great on that type of fabric.
customer_reviews.author: K. Mejia

customer_reviews.title: GOOD Gorilla grib
customer_reviews.text: I love this cover!! Helps with the both long and short dog hair along with all the small spills that come with a family. I prefer take it to the laundry mate for cleaning do to the grip backing. I also recommend no heat drying. I've also taken a vaccume. 👍Straps work great even without my sofa having removable cushions.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica ABV

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty! Perfect color
customer_reviews.text: We had a different model before this and it finally wore out. This one is much thicker and more plush than the last. The color is a perfect match for our leather sofa. With two small dogs that think our expensive couch is their bed, I wouldn't ever think of not having this product. I didn't use the no slip straps on this but simply tucked the arm flaps under the cushions and it stays in place. Looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Gift Card Recipient

customer_reviews.title: Major problem with washing, all backing comes off
customer_reviews.text: I just loved this pet cover.......until I washed it! It made such a horrible mess in my washing machine, it literally plugged my $2700. washing machine up. All the rubber backing comes off in little tiny rubber balls. I washed it in cold wash on gentle cycle and hung it on a drying rack. Sad because it was so perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl David

customer_reviews.title: Get the velvet one instead
customer_reviews.text: I bought the velvet one for a chair and it's great. I thought I was buying another velvet one for the sofa but apparently I chose the non velvet one. The quality is good but it's not easy to clean, it absorbs smells and dirt. If you're going to get one of these get the velvet one instead. I went ahead and ordered the velvet one and I'm just keeping this one on hand when I wash the other one. I bought it because I have dogs that love to lounge on the furniture.
customer_reviews.author: L. Nieves

customer_reviews.title: Don't grip
customer_reviews.text: These are nice feeling and looking, but they definitely do not "grip" my couch whatsoever. I was sorely disappointed to see how well these don't work at staying on the sofa. I use the guard/strap along the bottom, under the cushions to help keep it in place. I didn't use the ones around the backside of the sofa because, 1. They didn't stay put and were slipping off, and 2. The straps are very unsightly.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Garbage. They don't stay in place OR cover the sofa
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. These look nice for about 5 minutes, until you sit down. The fabric that covers the back isn't secured so it falls down immediately, looking sloppy and not protecting the couch/sofa. The fabric that covers the arms is made for thin couch/sofa arms; if you have a couch with thicker arms, the fabric doesn't cover them well.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Russell

customer_reviews.title: Great for leather couches and big dogs!
customer_reviews.text: Having a big dog and a leather couch can be a nightmare, especially when every couch cover on the market is “double sided,” meaning they WILL NOT stay on the couch. But these are a total life saver! Tidying up the living room used to be a constant chore of adjusting and re-adjusting the couch covers, but with these I haven’t needed to readjust in days! And the variety of colors is also really cool, considering I hadn’t found a couch color in anything other than brown or beige until I found this company.
customer_reviews.author: BlackRock13

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: It is a little short for my 7’ couch. But it looks nice, the dogs love it, it’s soft to the touch. Easy to put on and take off when guest arrive. We got grey and it works well on our charcoal coach. I have 4 dogs between 35 and 120 lbs that lay on this couch or jump on it to see the neighbor walk their dog and this will save my couch.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Albro

customer_reviews.title: Good cover but shrinks with washing
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for a little over 6 months. I wanted to see his it was over the course of time. I really like like cover and it provides the protection that we need for our Great Dane. The one issue I have is that I wash it every other week and it keeps shrinking. It was once oversized and it slowly becoming too small to fit. I did follow the instructions given as well. For the price I would have to replace it again so soon.
customer_reviews.author: Lilbloon

customer_reviews.title: Rust stain/spot on arm.
customer_reviews.text: I like this couch cover. Unfortch, when I unfolded it I found a rust stain on one of the arms (at least I hope it’s rust🙏🏽). I don’t like to bother with returning things so I applied stain remover and put it in the washer—you’re supppsed to wash it before using it anyway. Unfortunately again, the stain is still there. I’m still using it and maybe I’ll find a grey patch or sticker to place over it. It’s a very good product and would get 5 stars from me if not for the rust stain.
customer_reviews.author: Carmel F.

customer_reviews.title: Throws and Things - Very Nice.
customer_reviews.text: This product was designed and fabricated with pets in mind. The fabric is very durable. It’s very responsive to being washed. And it doesn’t fade or deteriorate after repeated cleanings. I would advise to use the delicate cycle for cleaning purposes. It also has bands that keep the slip cover in place. Those have shown a little bit of wear over time. However, this is because I have two medium sized dogs that sometimes wrestle and roughhouse on the couch. It’s a very nice product. And I highly recommend it if you have pets, children or moderate wear for your couch.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin J Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Product
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely hate these covers...do not waste your money. The backing material falls off like tons on little snowballs. At first I thought it was because I didn't wash right away. Have washed it multiple times on gentle cycle and air dried. Still have the same issue with the backing material falling off.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: A Godsend with pets and kids!
customer_reviews.text: I have a year old Siberian Husky. Thank God for this cover. She absolutely loves mud puddles and enjoys bringing in the results of playing in them. My couch would have been destroyed without this cover. Also easy to clean...wager/dryer, that’s it. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: kATHLEEN mEYERS

customer_reviews.title: High Quality, non-slip backing that stays put, water resistant
customer_reviews.text: The cover was delivered very quickly by the next day and is very attractive and is a light gray just like I wanted with a suede like material. It has a nom slip material on the back of it that keeps it from sliding around on my fabric sectional so I don’t have to keep adjusting it like the last one I had that I ended up having to throw away. I’ve only had it a few days but so far I am very satisfied with it and I would recommend it to anyone with a large dog because it stays put pretty well
customer_reviews.author: Lynda  Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Will not last
customer_reviews.text: Originally gave this product 4 stars. When I purchase this product it seemed to stay in place quite well... After a few months of normal use, and washing twice on delicate and letting air dry, the couch cover is CONSTANTLY slipping. Disappointed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Stands up to 2 active dogs
customer_reviews.text: We have two very active young dogs that seem to think that the couch is a bouncy house. No protective cover stayed in place until I tried this one. It requires occasional minor rearranging, but has otherwise stayed where it should. I like the soft fabric which is holding up under doggie toenails and stayed remarkably clean.
customer_reviews.author: Karen from Davis

customer_reviews.title: Passed the dog test
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this when we got a new pleather couch to protect it from our 75 lb German Shepherd. It comes with straps but we have it on without the straps and it fits/stays perfectly. I have washed this twice, I wash it on delicate and then air dry it. It has stayed in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: Aoneil

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for the dogs but too expensive for what ...
customer_reviews.text: it was just tacky looking. Good enough for the dogs but too expensive for what I got. and when you wash it the back comes off and you have white stuff in your washer. UGH
customer_reviews.author: Elsie Campbell

customer_reviews.title: They stay put.
customer_reviews.text: I was so sick of adjusting the covers on my leather love seat and sofa. I still adjust them slightly each morning, but I've even had to sleep on this sofa a couple of nights and it barely needed adjustment. I have a 50lb dalmatian and her hair sticks to everything, except my gorilla slipcovers.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Reader

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Missing the seat anchors. Not in the package anywhere. The cover slides a lot
customer_reviews.author: jennifer moore

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: After washing it after two times the back part is slowly deteriorating, many small white round stuff are coming out. After two uses I’m not going to use it anymore, im trying other similar items that are easier to wash and more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Rommel

customer_reviews.title: Little White Gorilla Pebbles Everywhere
customer_reviews.text: It works as a cover, but after one cleaning, following all of the instructions, it started shedding the gorilla grip everywhere. Non Stop. I've had it for almost a year, and it produces just as many little white balls of rubber as the day I got it. It works as a couch cover, it stays in place as much as can be expected, but I have to vacuum every day. Probably gonna toss it soon.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S. Pollard

customer_reviews.title: Not Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in July 2018. The back of the cover is falling apart, leaving a mess of white crumbles on my couch. The material where the steel slots attach to the cover is tearing. There are two adults in the home, so we're not hard on our things. I'm having to buy new covers. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Ana R

customer_reviews.title: Grip pad comes off all over the places
customer_reviews.text: This sofa cover, although grips well did not fully cover my large sofa. Additionally the grip "balls" come off all over the place! I am constantly vacuuming them up and digging them out of the washer/dryer. Im really bummed out I paid $40 for this. :/
customer_reviews.author: EShaff

customer_reviews.title: Like the fit
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with the way the covers fit our sofa and recliners. The measurements given were exactly right. I haven't had them long enough to comment on stain and water resistance nor cleaning quality, but I will rate them when I've had sufficient time to gage the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Linda D Fritzer

customer_reviews.title: Very well made.
customer_reviews.text: This couch cover is the best. It is well made and had a non slip backing that holds it in place wonderfully. It came with straps. This cover is well made and you can’t beat the price. I will be buying another for my loveseat.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce10392

customer_reviews.title: Pass
customer_reviews.text: Backing is flaking off after 2 washes. Not gripping anything, straps are weak and pop off. Color not bright or attractive like picture.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Malin

customer_reviews.title: Good protection, but looks worn in a short time.
customer_reviews.text: Really good cover but have to adjust it pretty often. Not wear n very good. But like the backing, sure saved my sofa from a mess my grandsons new puppy made! But already show n signs do wear and only had it a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Paula D.

customer_reviews.title: The rubber backing is driving me crazy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this cover is fantastic (mostly) except the grippy backing. It sheds worse than my dogs. Little pieces of the backing are in every nook and cranny on my sofa and in my washing machine and dryer. Fantastic concept. Horrible reality. The straps to fasten it to the sofa are ingenious. The fabric is not particularly durable - my dogs shredded much of the stitching in a matter of weeks. If there really is a life time guarantee they make it tough to find. The link provided in their email does not work. :/
customer_reviews.author: RockinHorseRanch

customer_reviews.title: Dog cannot nest!
customer_reviews.text: These covers are amazing! My dog loves to pull down the couch covers and make a nest with traditional couch covers, however these are very secure with elastic band that goes under the cushions and behind the top of the couch, making it pull-down proof. Machine washable.. some of the gripper nubs peeled off (maybe like 50 of the zillion nubs) after the first wash with a commercial washer on the gentle cycle... but with the lifetime warranty, it is a good investment so far. Not sure how many washes they can stand.. but after 1 week no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Markie

customer_reviews.title: Very inferior product!  Only lasted 3 months!
customer_reviews.text: The picture is of the sofa cover after the third wash! The rubber backing has disintegrated! I received the cover on September 29, 2018 and today is January 4, 2019. Instructions said to wash in cold water and line or air dry and I followed those instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Hermine

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I only purchased one because I wasn't sure about it. It stays put in place better than previous ones I've tried. Easily wipes clean. So far, for me, the spots cleaned up with only a damp towel and water. I'm satisfied with it's durability. I'm definitely buying another one for our other couch!!
customer_reviews.author: TerriM

customer_reviews.title: Better than the slip on couch protector I bought from ...
customer_reviews.text: Better than the slip on couch protector I bought from Surefit, honestly! My issues before with slip covers is that you have to fix it every time someone sits on it. This Gorilla grip stays in place, thats a major plus.
customer_reviews.author: PoconoWife

customer_reviews.title: stays in place, comfortable under to sit on
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 brands when I bought a new couch to protect from my "leaky" dog. This is the only one that stayed in place, thanks to the 2 straps (1 behind back and 1 under seat cushions). It protects well, is machine washable, and is comfortable to sit on. I am buying more of this brand and getting rid of the others.
customer_reviews.author: Laura B

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: My new sofa arrived and my five cats love it. So, I ordered this cover and it’s terrific. I love the color and the fabric. The non-slip side is fabulous. It fits perfectly, and the straps make it more secure.
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: The backing is the worst!
customer_reviews.text: If you would like rubber pieces from the backing all over your washer and couch then buy this product. When every wash more and more debris falls off this thing. It says not to put it in the dryer and your should not. It's a guaranteed fire from all the pieces that are just behind.
customer_reviews.author: Angela S

customer_reviews.title: Ordering more!
customer_reviews.text: We just received it and put in on a large sofa . It seems secure and stays in place . The dogs seem to like it a lot and so far haven’t chewed on it . Lays out nicely . Going to order another one for the other sofa now
customer_reviews.author: arlene

customer_reviews.title: Looks so pretty. Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Grips my leather sofa so well, even when my cats jump on it. Looks so pretty. Easy to clean, just toss in washer. I put it in the dryer for a few minutes, then hang it up to dry. I love this cover!
customer_reviews.author: arb

customer_reviews.title: Good quality just wish the cover wouldn't slip down at the back of the sofa
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 children an pets in our home, I absolutely Love these covers to keep clean and protect my couches, my only complaint is the cover keeps sliding down onto the couch an won't stay up, so constantly tucking it back up.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Shuck

customer_reviews.title: Fail
customer_reviews.text: Although these keep my couch clean, after following the cleaning instruction little beads have fallen off and go all over my house. I have washed them about five times and beads are still falling off. They fill my washer machine and leave a trail any where they go. They also are do not grip well to my couch. I would not recommend this item at all.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Strozza

customer_reviews.title: Good, stays put, measure!
customer_reviews.text: If sofa is exactly 70 in, may want to go with the oversize one. Arm part was too short.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Inadequate Stitching
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these six months ago, and can no longer attach any of the straps due to shoddy stitching that fell apart within weeks. Now they keep falling down and shifting, so they look like hell and don't protect the couches from my dogs. I wish I hadn't wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Cats & leather furniture MUST HAVE
customer_reviews.text: Love these furniture covers. We have cats with claws and leather furniture so this was a great product for us. Love these soft material.
customer_reviews.author: Pointess

customer_reviews.title: The dogs like it.
customer_reviews.text: The cover is nice and seems to clean well. I do was they made a long length. Most couches are longer than 70”.
customer_reviews.author: Skip

customer_reviews.title: Keep shopping
customer_reviews.text: The couch cover looks nice but after one wash it was already fraying at the seams. In addition, the material that makes it slip resistant gets EVERYWHERE after a washing. I have washed twice now and I'm afraid to wash it again because it's already falling apart. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob C.

customer_reviews.title: It fits and works well
customer_reviews.text: I like that it keeps my pets from trashing my furniture
customer_reviews.author: AddieT

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Product is great. The backing is prevents it from sliding out of place. We haven’t even had to use the provided straps yet. Seems to clean easily.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product Great Grip and Lifetime satisfaction warranty
customer_reviews.text: The product is excellent and has great grip and moreover it comes with life long guarantee so you cannever go wrong with it..buy it blindly!
customer_reviews.author: Srinivas

customer_reviews.title: Stitching came undone and backing disintegrated after 2nd wash
customer_reviews.text: The covers were fine until the 2nd time they were washed when the stitching came apart (on the quilting) and the rubber non-slip backing broke down and coated the inside of the washing machine and continued to disintegrate when drying outside.
customer_reviews.author: karen k

customer_reviews.title: Could be awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I have not opinion myself, but my wife loves it. So I assume it is great because she is generally very critical about the product like this.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmet Coymak

customer_reviews.title: Easily slips off
customer_reviews.text: This cover easily slips off the couch and doesn't look great. I would return it if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Linda

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay
customer_reviews.text: I read the 5 stars comments, all were good. I don't know if these comments from the real consumers or not but this thing doesn't stay in one place when you sat down a few times. I thought it suppose to have something to strap on and make it stay, but the strap came with it is useless.
customer_reviews.author: hai

customer_reviews.title: Gripper feature is not great
customer_reviews.text: I paid more for this item compared to other couch covers because of the claim that it grips furniture better. While it looks nice & the straps are a nice feature (except back strap didn’t work on my couch because it’s not tall & square enough in the back) the grip really doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Marti S.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This gives us the protection we need and is way less of a pain than the full couch covers we had before
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Kaufman

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Extremely happy with product. Bought a second one for another sofa.
customer_reviews.author: BXA

customer_reviews.title: I love this item
customer_reviews.text: I love this item. The charcoal is beautiful and it stays put. YES MY OLD ONE DROVE ME CRAZY.. Nice material. easy to put on. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Oraha

customer_reviews.title: It is not waterproof, so, I'd advise if you're looking for a waterproof cover, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this product. It fit my sofa perfectly. I cannot address its ease of cleaning because I just applied it 2 days ago. The material is nice & fits as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Protects my 70" Sofa from 70Lb Dog
customer_reviews.text: got this for my 70 lb German Short Hair Pointer. It does a great job!
customer_reviews.author: J R.

customer_reviews.title: Backing comes off on couch.
customer_reviews.text: They look nice, but after washing the backing comes off on the sofa. I have hundreds of little white adhesive specks on the couch, so then I have to vacuum those off. Kind of defeats the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely saved my couch from being ruined. I board dogs at home so this was such a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: iheartelephants

customer_reviews.title: No slipping!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these couch covers! They don’t slip off which is great. We have a Mastiff that likes to curl up on the couch and they stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Bentley

customer_reviews.title: Fits but makes a mess after laundering
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to cover my sofa and it does that well; it does fit and it stays in place. However, I have washed this twice, per the manufacturers instructions on the tag, and both times the white rubber grips on the reverse side of the item come off and get EVERYWHERE. It’s like snow in the laundry room, in my washer, and all over me.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Braidotti

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Better then the cheaper products but still not great. I have to fix it almost every time we sit on the couch. Definitely disappointed. I just want one that will actually stay where it’s supposed to instead of falling off the top.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Morrison

customer_reviews.title: It won’t disappoint give it a go!
customer_reviews.text: Dogs love it and I like it too. I thought for sure it was going to be just another couch cover, but this surpassed my expectations. It is well designed and looks to be durable.
customer_reviews.author: p f

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I love this on my couch, I have kids so this is important. Once I washed it the first time the fabric became minimally bumpy and wasnt as soft.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Ann Poe

customer_reviews.title: I like the product
customer_reviews.text: I like the product, but it is hard to keep on the sofa. This is a great product if you have pets.
customer_reviews.author: Robert N. Daugherty

customer_reviews.title: Best Sofa Covers Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these sofa covers for our new sectional to protect them from spills and cat hair! The fit and color are great, and they are easy to remove when company comes over. We love the fact they are washable, although we haven’t had to wash them yet.
customer_reviews.author: M. Monroe

customer_reviews.title: Pieces falling off..
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased a second one I was so happy with the first one. However, the slip resistant material on the back of the second one I ordered is falling apart. Its makes for little white pieces all over the furniture. Ottherwise was happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit, stays on, just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Gingergale

customer_reviews.title: Sticks to the sofa
customer_reviews.text: Love this sofa cover. It doesn’t crumple when you sit on it. Stays put and looks nice . It’s exactly what I was looking for. Would only have liked a choice of color but I’m pleased with the grey.
customer_reviews.author: Bgj

customer_reviews.title: Shipping was very quick
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and easy installation. Covers a "chilly" leather couch to make it warm and cozy.
customer_reviews.author: raymond

customer_reviews.title: Color is off.
customer_reviews.text: This is not charcoal gray. The picture is much darker than the actual product. Not a bad cover for the couch and chairs however I will be returning them because they are light gray.
customer_reviews.author: J Despres

customer_reviews.title: Couch protector meets expectations.
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this couch protector. It fits nicely and the rubber backing keeps it in place.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie J Wright

customer_reviews.title: Cover doesn't move when dog lays on couch
customer_reviews.text: I love the fit and the ease of putting the couch cover on the couch. Most importantly, I love that the cover doesn't move or get messed up when the dog lays on the couch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is the second cover and I'll buy more when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This was what I needed for my poor old lady dog, who sometimes has accidents. But now between the diapers we bought and this, I no longer worry and she is happy happy to be my big lap dog!
customer_reviews.author: joannebennett

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The non slip part of it rocks. The design is good, however the surface isn’t great for dog hair. It’s kindof like a suede texture that seems to grab long hair.
customer_reviews.author: Zoop

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: My biggest problem with this product is when throwing it in the washing machine the "gripping" backing comes off terribly. Otherwise it fit good- we dont use the strap that wraps around the back.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Skahan

customer_reviews.title: Makes living area dirtier
customer_reviews.text: My couch and living area are worse off with this product. First time through the washer and all the beads on the back that make the product grip come off. Littering my couch and living area with little white balls. Will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: David Muhasky

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I do have to re-adjust it every week or so, but I also have 2 young kids. Material feels good - it's thin but not too thin which is what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pass
customer_reviews.text: Seems started splitting within 2 weeks, the back kept slipping down.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri grendel

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this cover. It is durable, soft, and easy to put on!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Pageler

customer_reviews.title: Stays in place
customer_reviews.text: The slipcover has been on my sofa for 5 days. It has had 4 dogs jumping on and off of it the entire time and it has not moved. I am very pleased with this cover. Just follow the directions and you will be as happy with it as I am.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Pretty color
customer_reviews.text: I used mine on a double recliner couch a little hard to attach under side but not impossible
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Meador

customer_reviews.title: Grip to leather sofa is strong.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for both leather couch and recliner. Also color is spot on. I have medium size dogs that share the couch, grip is flawless and barely moves.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Gabel

customer_reviews.title: A clean look that does the job
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and the feel of the cover. I wish it could be dried more easier (air dry only) but I understand it’s because of the rubber-like material that keeps it secured to the sofa.
customer_reviews.author: jelder0214

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Our puppy likes the covers so much, he w@ laying on them before we could get them on the couch!! Of course, wearability and durability are yet to be seen, but out of the box they are exactly as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed.
customer_reviews.text: It is great. I have washed it once and a lot of white non stick stuff from the backing came off, but it still in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: It's made very well and the gripe is outstanding
customer_reviews.text: Made very well the gripe they have is more than I was inspected. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Donald S.

customer_reviews.title: just got them they look great fit is great on couch but loveseat is a ...
customer_reviews.text: just got them they look great fit is great on couch but loveseat is a little big. I have leather and they are staying put and not sliding off. dog loves them. too soon to give 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: chris pierce

customer_reviews.title: Fits great!
customer_reviews.text: Came just as described and fits couch well! My couch is pretty standard, but couches with low, high, or wide arm rests may have trouble with the fit. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

product_meta.title: Gorilla Grip Original Slip Resistant Large Sofa Protector for Seat Width up to 70 Inch, Patent Pending Suede-Like Furniture Slipcover, 2 Inch Straps, Couch Slip Cover Throw for Dogs, Sofa, Dark Gray
feature_bullets: #1 SLIP-RESISTANT FURNITURE PROTECTOR: While other furniture protectors can slip and slide on your furniture, our protectors are engineered to stay in place! The slip-resistant Gorilla Grip backing helps the cover stay put on your fabric or leather furniture, even in busy homes with kids and pets. It also features not one, but two 2” patent-pending straps that help reduce the need for adjustments. Unlike other brands, the straps are adjustable and strong for long-lasting use.

PERFECT FIT: We offer our sofa sized covers in two sizes for the perfect fit. Choose from the LARGE (70" seat width) or the X-LARGE OVERSIZED (78" seat width). See our Measuring Guide in the photos for a list of all measurements.

/!\ WARNING: Strap should not be stretched to exceed seat width +10” (Large Sofa, Loveseat, 48” Chair, 23” Chair) or +16” (Extra Large Oversized Sofa, Recliner). Over-stretching strap can result in strap breaking and snapping back at you!

SUPER-SOFT SUEDE: You’ll have to feel it to believe it! The Gorilla Grip Nonslip Furniture Protector features a soft top layer of luxurious suede-like material that will help keep you comfortable and cozy for years to come. Its thick material is so smooth and soft to the touch and easily repels liquids, hair and other messes, helping to keep your furniture like new. Simply Plus, it’s machine washable! We recommend washing before first use. Wash on cold and air dry (no dryer).

10-YEAR GUARANTEE: If you are at all unsatisfied with your product, please contact us (through Amazon if past the standard return window) to take advantage of our best in class 10-year guarantee, even if past the 30 day window. DO NOT USE ON FURNITURE TREATED WITH ADDITIVES, CLEANERS, OR CONDITIONERS. They may react with the PVC backing and result in damage to your furniture. Some materials are pre-treated. Check with furniture manufacturer and retailer before use.
